lead_paragraph: Rejecting a move to Premier League rivals Arsenal was an easy decision for Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy because he has "unfinished business" with the champions.

headline.print_headline: 'Unfinished Business' at Leicester Made Vardy Decision Easy
headline.main: 'Unfinished Business' at Leicester Made Vardy Decision Easy

snippet: Rejecting a move to Premier League rivals Arsenal was an easy decision for Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy because he has "unfinished business" with the champions....
